name: The Tape (itch)
description:
WASD - Move
Left Click - Interact/Zoom Camera
Right Click - Alt Interact(Keys/VHS)
Left Shift - Sprint
Tab - Inventory
ESC - Pause Menu

This Game will be free till its complete all feedback is welcome in the forum below!


On 01/09/2019, a camera belonging to Johnathon Leigh was found by a jogger on a trail and brought to the police station. The jogger, who watched the footage on the camera, was later admitted to a mental hospital and has not spoken since. The footage from the camera is possibly disturbing and its contents are currently unknown.
